original_title: Wir Sind Doch Keine Lahmen Enten
overview: Now the summer holidays have finally arrived. Marco (Tobias Blume) and Tobi (Ren√© Hahn) have forged ahead many plans, which are from their point of view, the entire eight weeks vacation according to varied and form under boys. But then comes the "bad" news: Marco should drive for a time in a summer camp in the Erzgebirge. What about the beautiful plans of the two?
title: We Are Not Lame Ducks
